price: Então, quando chegaram os mágicos, Moisés disse-lhes: "Lançai o que tendes para lançar"
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
